page.title: 08A RESIDENT OF HELPERBY
page.content: {Mrs Plowman-Render is a typical {resident of Helperby.She lives in Back {Lane. { There are approximately one thousand {souls living in Helperby but there {used to be five hundred about twenty {years ago. { The land has changed a lot because {they have built about forty houses on {what used to be good farmland across {the road from the Plowman-Renders' {house. { She told us that there is a war {memorial to the men who fell in the {Boer War (built in 1902) and a {fountain put up in 1897 to commemorate {the Diamond Jubilee of Queen Victoria. { There are a number of shops that are {available in the village from an {antique shop to the most modern sort {of grocery. { }
